changes.title: Improved API Performance
changes.description: Enhanced the performance of all WordPress API features with better caching and reduced database queries.
changes.previous_behavior: API calls could take longer with multiple database queries per request.
changes.current_behavior: API response times reduced by 40% through optimized database queries and added result caching.

changes.title: Taxonomy Term Management
changes.description: Added ability to assign and manage taxonomy terms when creating or updating posts.
changes.previous_behavior: Could not manage taxonomy terms through the post creation/update APIs.
changes.current_behavior: Can now add, remove and set taxonomy terms during post operations.

changes.title: List Media Library Items
changes.description: New API feature for retrieving a list of media items from the WordPress media library with filtering options for pagination, search terms, and mime types.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now programmatically retrieve and filter media library items with structured responses containing metadata and file information.

changes.title: Get Media Item Details
changes.description: New API feature for retrieving detailed information about a specific media item, including available image sizes and metadata.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can retrieve comprehensive information about a specific media item by ID, including all available image sizes for images.

changes.title: Upload Media to Library
changes.description: New API feature for uploading files to the WordPress media library using base64-encoded file data.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can now programmatically upload media files to the WordPress media library with support for additional metadata like title, caption, and alt text.

changes.title: Delete Media Items
changes.description: New API feature for removing items from the WordPress media library with options for force deletion.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can programmatically delete media items, with options to bypass the trash and force delete them permanently.

changes.title: List WordPress Posts
changes.description: New API feature for retrieving and filtering WordPress posts of any post type with comprehensive filtering and sorting options.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can retrieve filtered lists of posts with support for pagination, search, ordering, and post type filtering.

changes.title: Get WordPress Post Details
changes.description: New API feature for retrieving comprehensive information about a specific WordPress post by ID.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can retrieve detailed post information including content, metadata, taxonomies, and featured image data.

changes.title: Create WordPress Posts
changes.description: New API feature for programmatically creating new WordPress posts of any post type.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can create new posts with specified content, featured images, and metadata across any available post type.

changes.title: Update WordPress Posts
changes.description: New API feature for modifying existing WordPress posts with partial updates support.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can update existing posts with support for partial updates, only modifying the specified fields while leaving others unchanged.

changes.title: Delete WordPress Posts
changes.description: New API feature for removing WordPress posts with options for bypassing the trash.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can delete posts with options to move to trash or permanently delete, with appropriate permission checks to ensure security.

changes.title: Initial Plugin Framework
changes.description: First release of the WordPress Feature API framework for AI agents.
changes.current_behavior: Basic plugin structure and WordPress integration with initial options management features.

changes.title: Get WordPress Option
changes.description: API feature for retrieving WordPress options from the database.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can retrieve WordPress options with proper permission checks.

changes.title: Update WordPress Option
changes.description: API feature for updating WordPress options in the database.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can update WordPress options with proper permission checks.

changes.title: Delete WordPress Option
changes.description: API feature for removing WordPress options from the database.
changes.current_behavior: AI agents can delete WordPress options with proper permission checks.
